sentence.Network_en: I reminded of another a words: In the world again big simpletons all have an epigone!
sentence.Network_cn: 我想起了另外一句话: 世界上再大的傻瓜都有一个追随者!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 王是一部史诗(epic),因此才有了追随者(epigone)。——从词源学上讲,这里存在着某种逻辑的必然。所以,王的忌日对于这些人而言,就像一个个微小的时间隧道,他们灵魂.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: plurals from French épigones and Latin epigoni, from Greek epigonoi 'those born afterwards' (based on gignesthai 'be born')

means.word_mean: 1. an inferior imitator of some distinguished writer or artist of musician
